entry.title: 30days Charange 20140207- Day18
entry.content:
I started using Synergy. This software makes me to be able to share a Mac keyboard and mouse to a Windows machine. For example, when I use a Mac keyboard, I can type a windows machine by using mac keyboard.

I use a HappyHackingKeyboard that is so small but if I put my MacbookAir 11-inch, I feel my desk is too confined to type a keyboard HHKB.

Synergy had some bugs when Mavericks had started available. But now, I can use this normally.

This is a great software!!!

entry.title: 30days Charange 20140207- Day17
entry.content: Push Bullet is very good tool for me. Because of this, I can kill the notification sound of my android device.
